body_html:
There's a lot going on in this thread.

@rmlarsen It seems -lgomp and -zmuldefs were introduced four days ago in 72c023d. Do we need select() expressions to make them cross platform?

@martinwicke Does "ERROR: Inconsistent crosstool configuration; no toolchain corresponding to 'local_darwin' found for cpu 'darwin'." mean anything to you?

@jugglerix Are there opportunities here to improve install_mac.md?
